S

saveShipPos(String, User) - Method in class andrzej.appdemo.shipwar.ShipwarController
Saves the ship's position in the database as the number 1 in the 64-character string variable.
setRoundAndShot(User, User, String) - Static method in class andrzej.appdemo.shipwar.ShipwarGame
If the user is an active player then enemy is fired and if after this the enemy has ships, activePlayer's flag goes to the enemy.
ShipwarController - Class in andrzej.appdemo.shipwar
This class is responsible for managing the responses to requests generated by the user who plays ships.
ShipwarController() - Constructor for class andrzej.appdemo.shipwar.ShipwarController
 
ShipwarGame - Class in andrzej.appdemo.shipwar
This class is responsible for controlling the game It provides methods to check the placement of ships, determine the active player, conduct fire, end the game.
ShipwarGame() - Constructor for class andrzej.appdemo.shipwar.ShipwarGame
 
showPlayPage(Model) - Method in class andrzej.appdemo.shipwar.ShipwarController
Checks whether the user has correctly set up the ships and tries to find enemy for current user If there is an enemy ready to play, his id is assigned to logged in user and variable gameId is set to 3 that means users are playing game now.
showShipwarPage(Model) - Method in class andrzej.appdemo.shipwar.ShipwarController
Takes the logged in user sets his gameId to 1 and reset variable warTable which represents ships on the board then adds user to the model attributes and send it to the shipwarAJAX page.
